full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement - Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)**

# Notice Overview
The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) has issued an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for the delivery of a **Gas Chromatography/Mass Spectrometer**. This ACAN is open for a period of 15 days.

## Tender Information

| Field Name | Field Value |
| --- | --- |
| **Tender Title** | Gas Chromatography/Mass Spectrometer |
| **Tender Reference Number** | 23-58242 |
| **Public Tendering Date** | 2024-02-02 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | 2024-02-20T14:00:00 |
| **Trade Agreement** | Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) |

## Contract Overview

The NRC's Aquatic and Crop Resource Development requires the delivery, supply of a **Gas Chromatography/Mass Spectrometer** in Halifax, Nova Scotia.

## Security Requirement Notification
Security requirements are associated with this ACAN. The successful contractor will be required to meet these security requirements.

## Tender Invitation

The NRC invites eligible suppliers to submit a Statement of Capabilities (SoC) to demonstrate how they meet the advertised requirements. Interested suppliers must submit their SoC in writing to the contact person identified below by the tender closing date.

## Contact Information

* Name: Kelsie Coughlan
* Position: Senior Procurement Officer
* Directorate: Finance and Procurement Services
* Address: 1200 Montreal Road, Building M-58
* City: Ottawa
* Province: Ontario
* Postal Code: K1A 0R6
* Country: Canada
* Phone: 613-890-4485
* Email: [Kelsie.Coughlan@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:Kelsie.Coughlan@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)

## Inquiries

To ensure a response before the tender closing date, all inquiries regarding this ACAN must be submitted in writing and received by the Contracting Authority at least five (5) calendar days prior to the closing date.

## Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: 2024-02-20T14:00:00
* Note: This ACAN is open for a period of 15 days.

**Download the complete tender documents [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31177/
